member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Chart3D.GrahamConvexHull.FindHull(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Windows.Point})
member.summary: Find convex hull for the given set of points.
member.param: Set of points to search convex hull for.
member.returns: Returns set of points, which form a convex hull for the given . The first point in the list is the point with lowest X coordinate (and with lowest Y if there are several points with the same X value). Points are provided in counter clockwise order (Cartesian coordinate system).
